email-server-credentials.name: Email Server Credentials
email-server-credentials.description:
Block used to manage generic email server authentication.
It is recommended you use a
[Google App Password](https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/185833)
if you use Gmail. This block is part of the prefect-email collection. Install prefect-email with `pip install prefect-email` to use this block.
email-server-credentials.code_example:
Load stored email server credentials:
```python
from prefect_email import EmailServerCredentials
email_credentials_block = EmailServerCredentials.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.description:
Block used to manage generic email server authentication.
It is recommended you use a
[Google App Password](https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/185833)
if you use Gmail.

username.description: The username to use for authentication to the server. Unnecessary if SMTP login is not required.
username.title: Username

password.description: The password to use for authentication to the server. Unnecessary if SMTP login is not required.
password.title: Password

smtp_server.description: Either the hostname of the SMTP server, or one of the keys from the built-in SMTPServer Enum members, like 'gmail'.
smtp_server.title: SMTP Server

smtp_port.description: If provided, overrides the smtp_type's default port number.
smtp_port.title: SMTP Port

verify.description: If `False`, SSL certificates will not be verified. Default to `True`.
verify.title: Verify

fields.title: EmailServerCredentials

SMTPType.description: Protocols used to secure email transmissions.
SMTPType.title: SMTPType
